name: Glazed Carrots Asian Style
author: Robyn Webb
summary: This method of preparing carrots will have us all eating like Bugs Bunny! Preparation time: 10 minutes. This recipe is from The WEBB Cooks, articles and recipes by Robyn Webb, courtesy of the American Diabetes Association.
directions: Bring a large pot of water to boil, add the carrots and parboil for 5 minutes
Drain and rinse with cold water
In a large glass dish, combine the remaining ingredients
Add the carrots and marinate for 30 minutes
Prepare an outdoor grill with an oiled rack set 4 inches from the heat source
Using a oiled wire hinged vegetable basket or just directly on the rack ( whichever you find easier), grill the carrots, turning constantly for a total of 10 minutes, until slightly charred
